thread.title: BRIEF-Gazit-Globe Q4 rental income NIS 726 Million

title: BRIEF-Gazit-Globe Q4 rental income NIS 726 Million
text:
March 28, 2018 / 7:55 AM / Updated an hour ago BRIEF-Gazit-Globe Q4 rental income NIS 726 Million Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
March 28 (Reuters) - Gazit-Globe Ltd: 
* Q4 RENTAL INCOME NIS 726 MILLION (US$ 209 MILLION) COMPARED TO NIS 712 MILLION (US$ 205 MILLION) IN THE SAME QUARTER LAST YEAR. 
* NOI FOR Q4 TOTALED NIS 483 MILLION (US$ 139 MILLION) VERSUS NIS 484 MILLION (US$ 140 MILLION) IN Q4 LAST YEAR‍​ 
* GAZIT GLOBE - Q4 FFO NIS 162 MILLION (US$ 46.7 MILLION), OR NIS 0.84 PER SHARE (US$ 0.24), 
* SAME PROPERTY NOI IN Q4 INCREASED BY 2.0% COMPARED TO THE SAME QUARTER LAST YEAR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
